member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetDataAdaptersList
member.summary: Get the list of registered data adapters.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetRequestUrl(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the URL for viewer requests

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetResourceUrl(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the URL for viewer resources

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.CreateRequestParams
member.summary: Create default viewer RequestParams to save the report into cache

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetReport
member.summary: The event occurs when the report template is requested after running the designer.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.CreateReport
member.summary: The event occurs when creating a new report template using the file menu.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.SaveReport
member.summary: The event occurs when saving the report template.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.SaveReportAs
member.summary: The event occurs when saving as file the report template.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.PreviewReport
member.summary: The event occurs before rendering the report for preview. Allowed to change the properties of the report, register the data.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.PrintReport
member.summary: The event occurs before the printing of the report from the preview.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.ExportReport
member.summary: The event occurs before the exporting of the report from the preview tab.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.ExportReportResponse
member.summary: The event occurs after the report is exported from the preview tab.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.EmailReport
member.summary: The event occurs when sending a report via Email. In this event it is necessary to set settings for sending Email.

member.name: E:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.Exit
member.summary: The event occurs when clicking on the Exit button in the main menu.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetRequestParams
member.summary: Get the all request parameters of the report designer.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetReportObject
member.summary: Get the report template or report snapshot, sent by the client. If the report was not passed, the method tries to take it from the cache.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetReportObject(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams)
member.summary: Get the report template or report snapshot, sent by the client. If the report was not passed, the method tries to take it from the cache. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetExportSettings
member.summary: Get the export settings from the dialog form of the report preview.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetExportSettings(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams)
member.summary: Get the export settings from the dialog form of the report preview. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetEmailOptions
member.summary: Get the Email options from the dialog, sent by the client.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.GetEmailOptions(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams)
member.summary: Get the Email options from the dialog, sent by the client. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets the current visual theme which is used for drawing visual elements of the designer.

member.summary: Gets or sets a path to the localization file for the designer.

member.summary: Gets or sets the URL text to display in the About dialog of the designer.

member.summary: Gets or sets the report page grid size of the designer in centimetres.

member.summary: Gets or sets the report page grid size of the designer in hundredths of inches.

member.summary: Gets or sets the report page grid size of the designer in inches.

member.summary: Gets or sets the report page grid size of the designer in millimeters.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that show or hide tooltips.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that show or hide the help link in tooltips.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that show or hide the help button in dialogs.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that show or hide help tips in dialogs.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.ShowMoreDetailsButton
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that displays or hides the More Details button in the error dialog.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.ShowCancelButton
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that displays or hides the Cancel button in the window of getting the data from the server.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.FlashWMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the Window Mode property of the SWF file for transparency, layering, positioning, and rendering in the browser.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.DateFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a date format for datetime values in designer. To use a server date format please set the StiDateFormatMode.FromServer or "FromServer" string value. The default is the client system date format.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.ImagesQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets an images quality for the report components such as Rich Text, Rotated Text, Charts, Bar Codes.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.BrowserTitle
member.summary: The designer window title in full screen moode.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.AutoHideScrollbars
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that allows automatically hide report scrollbars in preview if not required.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.CurrentPageBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a color of the border of the current report page in preview.

member.summary: Gets or sets a browser window to open links from the report.

member.summary: Gets or sets a browser window to open the exported report.

member.summary: Gets or sets a count columns in preview parameters panel.

member.summary: Gets or sets a editor width in preview parameters panel.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.SaveReportMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the save report mode - Hidden (AJAX mode), Visible (POST mode) or New Window.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.SaveReportAsMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the save report mode - Hidden (AJAX mode), Visible (POST mode) or New Window.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.RunWizardAfterLoad
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that displays the new report wizard at designer startup.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.ShowSaveDialog
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that displays or hides the report name dialog at saving.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.SetReportModifiedWhenOpening
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that marks a report as modified when it is opened.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.AllowModifyTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that enables or disables the ability to modify loaded components of report templates. It allows creating and editing new components only.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.AutoSaveInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets an auto save interval of the report in minutes. The default value is 0 (auto save feature is disabled).

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.DesignerEventFunction
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the JavaScript function that will be called by the designer when performing actions.

member.summary: The URL address, by which transfer will be done when clicking the Exit button in the main menu.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.ShowPreviewMultiplePageViewModeButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a visibility of the Multiple Page button in the view mode panel of the preview.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.ShowPreviewZoomButtons
member.summary: Gets or sets a visibility of Zoom buttons in the toolbar of the preview.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.CacheHelper
member.summary: Gets or sets an instance of the StiCacheHelper class that will be used for report caching on the server side.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.RequestTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets time which indicates how many seconds the client side will wait for the response from the server side. The default value is 20 seconds.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.CacheTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets time which indicates how many minutes the result of the report rendering will be stored in the server cache or session. The default value is 20 minutes.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.CacheMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode of the report caching.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.CacheItemPriority
member.summary: Specifies the relative priority of report, stored in the system cache.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.RepeatCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the the number of repeats of requests of the server side to the client side, when getting errors of obtaining data.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.EnableDataLogger
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that enables or disables the logging of all requests/responses.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.UseRelativeUrls
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that the designer will use relative or absolute URLs.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.PassQueryParametersForResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which enables or disables the transfer of URL parameters when requesting the scripts and styles of the designer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.Report
member.summary: Gets or sets a report object which to edit in the designer.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.Design(Stimulsoft.Report.StiReport)
member.summary: Start the designer in full screen mode with the specified report.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesignerFx.Design
member.summary: Start the designer in full screen mode with the previously specified report. The report should be specified in the OnGetReport event.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetRequestParams
member.summary: Get the all request parameters of the report designer.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetActionReportObject
member.summary: Get the current report template for the current action of the component. Returns report template from the client for OpenReport action, new report template for CreateReport action, copy of the report template for PreviewReport action. Otherwise returns report template from the cache.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetActionReportObject(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams)
member.summary: Get the current report template for the current action of the component. Returns report template from the client for OpenReport action, new report template for CreateReport action, copy of the report template for PreviewReport action. Otherwise returns report template from the cache. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetReportObject
member.summary: Get the current report template from the cache.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiWebDesigner.GetReportObject(Stimulsoft.Report.Web.StiRequestParams)
member.summary: Get the current report template from the cache. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.summary: Get the export settings from the dialog form of the report preview.

member.summary: Get the export settings from the dialog form of the report preview. The specified request parameters will be used.

member.name: T:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.JSON
member.summary:
This class encodes and decodes JSON strings. http://www.json.org/
JSON uses Arrays and Objects. These correspond here to the datatypes ArrayList and Hashtable. All numbers are parsed to doubles.

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.JSON.Decode(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.JSON.Decode(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Parses the string json into a value; and fills 'success' with the successfullness of the parse.
member.returns: An ArrayList, a Hashtable, a double, a string, null, true, or false

member.name: M:Stimulsoft.Report.Web.JSON.Encode(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts a Hashtable / ArrayList object into a JSON string
member.returns: A JSON encoded string, or null if object 'json' is not serializable
